snippet: Dave Walker, a co-founder of the No Labels bipartisan movement, responds to a column by Gail Collins.
abstract: Letter from former United States comptroller general David M Walker responds to April 4 Op-Ed column by Gail Collins about Congress's failure to pass a Postal Service bill.
lead_paragraph: Dave Walker, a co-founder of the No Labels bipartisan movement, responds to a column by Gail Collins.

headline.main: How to Make Congress Do Its Job: No Budget, No Pay
headline.print_headline: How to Make Congress Do Its Job: No Budget, No Pay
